primary_contest.tagline: Warmup with some our our tricky Data Structure and Algorithm Challenges
primary_contest.description:
For those who'd like to gain some practice with some of the basic Data Structure, Algorithm and careful coding kind of challenges!
Arrays, Maps, Linked Lists, Trees: Here are some of the most popular challenges from our site, wrapped into a fun practice contest for you.
primary_contest.name: Algorithms Practice Match 2

model.preview: Find the minimum size of the largest clique in a graph.
model.name: Clique
